name: Fate Core Folio
description:
A Folio to help you manage your Fate Core characters. Allows you to create using either the 3 story phases, or just create your aspects and go.

Features:
* Character Editing and Viewing on the same screen
* Custom Skills
* Full Extra Support
* Editor for Aspects and Stunts
* Track Consequences
* Fate Dice Roller
* And More!
